UniprotID	P80098
Accession	P80098;Q569J6
EntryName	CCL7_HUMAN
ProteinName	C-C motif chemokine 7 (Monocyte chemoattractant protein 3) (Monocyte chemotactic protein 3) (MCP-3) (NC28) (Small-inducible cytokine A7)
GeneName	CCL7 MCP3 SCYA6 SCYA7
Length	99
Function	Chemotactic factor that attracts monocytes and eosinophils, but not neutrophils. Augments monocyte anti-tumor activity. Also induces the release of gelatinase B. This protein can bind heparin. Binds to CCR1, CCR2 and CCR3.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
